column4: What do I need to install for gnome, to get all the core parts  of gnome for use with Kubuntu?
Is totem supposed to be gnome's video player?
Ubuntu arguably has the best GNOME desktop out there, so if you don't like Ubuntu's you should definetly find something else
I use Kubuntu just fine, thank you. :)
Yeah. That's my normal as of late. It's got some issues of it's own though. The text interface on it's a bit slow.
you can get rid of the media automounter in kcontrol under KDE Services

The part I really want to stop, mostly, is the fact it keeps opening a Konquerer to a CD/DVD I put in, and if it's a DVD movie, it'll auto-play it in Kaffeine. I like the popup window that asks me what to do, but when all 3 happen at the same time, it's annoying.
Any idea how to fix that part of things in KDE? :)
